snippet: Record-keepers examining long-forgotten documents in a courthouse have found some unremarkable depositions with a noteworthy signature: Melvin Purvis Jr., the FBI man famous for tracking down John Dillinger and other gangsters in the 1930s....

headline.print_headline: Papers Signed by Famous '30s FBI Man Found in Ohio
headline.main: Papers Signed by Famous '30s FBI Man Found in Ohio

lead_paragraph: Record-keepers examining long-forgotten documents in a courthouse have found some unremarkable depositions with a noteworthy signature: Melvin Purvis Jr., the FBI man famous for tracking down John Dillinger and other gangsters in the 1930s.
